quotes.quote: We cannot really love anybody with whom we never laugh.
quotes.author: Agnes Repplier

quotes.quote: He deserves Paradise who makes his companions laugh.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: We laugh a lot. That's for sure. Sure beats the alternative, doesn't it?
quotes.author: Betty White

quotes.quote: The more you find out about the world, the more opportunities there are to laugh at it.
quotes.author: Bill Nye

quotes.quote: Laughter gives us distance. It allows us to step back from an event, deal with it and then move on.
quotes.author: Bob Newhart

quotes.quote: Total absence of humor renders life impossible.
quotes.author: Colette

quotes.quote: Laughter is by definition healthy.
quotes.author: Doris Lessing

quotes.quote: The most wasted of all days is one without laughter.
quotes.author: e e cummings

quotes.quote: If you don't learn to laugh at trouble, you won't have anything to laugh at when you're old.
quotes.author: Edgar Watson Howe

quotes.quote: Laugh at yourself first, before anyone else can.
quotes.author: Elsa Maxwell

quotes.quote: You cannot be mad at somebody who makes you laugh - it's as simple as that.
quotes.author: Jay Leno

quotes.quote: If we couldn't laugh, we would all go insane.
quotes.author: Jimmy Buffett

quotes.quote: In this life he laughs longest who laughs last.
quotes.author: John Masefield

quotes.quote: Man is distinguished from all other creatures by the faculty of laughter.
quotes.author: Joseph Addison

quotes.quote: One doesn't have a sense of humor. It has you.
quotes.author: Larry Gelbart

quotes.quote: Always laugh when you can. It is cheap medicine.
quotes.author: Lord Byron

quotes.quote: The human race has one really effective weapon, and that is laughter.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: He who laughs, lasts!
quotes.author: Mary Pettibone Poole

quotes.quote: You don't stop laughing because you grow old. You grow old because you stop laughing.
quotes.author: Michael Pritchard

quotes.quote: Laughter is inner jogging.
quotes.author: Norman Cousins

quotes.quote: I was irrevocably betrothed to laughter, the sound of which has always seemed to me to be the most civilized music in the world.
quotes.author: Peter Ustinov

quotes.quote: You can't deny laughter; when it comes, it plops down in your favorite chair and stays as long as it wants.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: Beware of too much laughter, for it deadens the mind and produces oblivion.
quotes.author: The Talmud

quotes.quote: Laughter is the closest distance between two people.
quotes.author: Victor Borge

quotes.quote: Among those whom I like or admire, I can find no common denominator, but among those whom I love, I can: all of them make me laugh.
quotes.author: W. H. Auden
